message: Let's make a deal! I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good offer for you to start with, considering the money loses value over time.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the money is losing value.  Let's get this done quickly before the value drops too much.
Bob, time is running out and the money is losing value. I'll meet you in the middle - 55/45 my way. Let's close this deal.
